alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 09 at 3:50AM CDT until May 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Ashland and Iron Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. High profile vehicles may be difficult to operate within the highest gusts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest winds will be along the terrain ridge through central Ashland and northern Iron County.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
